name: Cubonova
description:
Fly your way through this addicting side-scroller.

Collect coins to gain a shield and watch out with the different obstacles and challenges that you will face while flying your way through this endless scroller game.

In addition to the challenge some levels have an inverted gravity so you will have to be fast and adapt to this levels or you will fail.

It's and easy to play game with a one tap mechanic but don't be fooled , it's challenging and if you're not fast and careful enough you will fail , a lot.
